b.ts(22,5): error TS2403: Subsequent variable declarations must have the same type.  Variable 'ctor' must be of type 'any', but here has type 'new (s: string) => { s: string; }'.


==== a.js (0 errors) ====
    /** @type {String} */
    var S;
    
    /** @type {string} */
    var s;
    
    /** @type {Number} */
    var N;
    
    /** @type {number} */
    var n;
    
    /** @type {Boolean} */
    var B;
    
    /** @type {boolean} */
    var b;
    
    /** @type {Void} */
    var V;
    
    /** @type {void} */
    var v;
    
    /** @type {Undefined} */
    var U;
    
    /** @type {undefined} */
    var u;
    
    /** @type {Null} */
    var Nl;
    
    /** @type {null} */
    var nl;
    
    /** @type {Array} */
    var A;
    
    /** @type {array} */
    var a;
    
    /** @type {Promise} */
    var P;
    
    /** @type {promise} */
    var p;
    
    /** @type {?number} */
    var nullable;
    
    /** @type {Object} */
    var Obj;
    
    /** @type {object} */
    var obj;
    
    /** @type {Function} */
    var Func;
    
    /** @type {(s: string) => number} */
    var f;
    
    /** @type {new (s: string) => { s: string }} */
    var ctor;
